short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detect if an audio or video is a deepfake or real

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Deepfake Detector is a browser extension designed to identify whether the video or audio content you're viewing has been altered using deepfake voice technology. With the increasing prevalence of AI-generated content, this tool empowers users to detect and verify the authenticity of digital media in real-time.

Key Features:

Real-Time Detection: Analyze videos and audio on platforms like YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, and more as you watch or listen.
Advanced AI Algorithms: Employs cutting-edge technology to accurately detect deepfakes and manipulated content using probabilities.
Simple and Intuitive Interface: Start detection with a single click, directly from the extension icon.
Broad Platform Compatibility: Seamlessly supports a range of streaming and social media websites.
Privacy-First Approach: Ensures secure processing of data through encrypted APIs, protecting user privacy and adhering to industry standards.
How It Works:

Install the extension and pin it to your browser for easy access.
While viewing or listening to content on supported platforms, click the Deepfake Detector icon.
The tool analyzes the media in real time, detecting signs of deepfake manipulation.
Results are displayed instantly, helping you assess the credibility of the content.
Why Use Deepfake Detector?

Stay Protected: Safeguard yourself from deceptive deepfake scams or misinformation.
Confidence in Media: Verify the authenticity of videos and audio with minimal effort.
State-of-the-Art Technology: Use advanced detection algorithms to navigate the digital world confidently.
